    • Method Detail

      • registerEventListener

        void registerEventListener(EventModel event,
                           EventListenerModel eventListener)
                    throws IllegalIDException
        Adds an listener for events that gets called before the generation of the resources and the outputPlugins..

        Be careful with this method, it will register the listener for ALL the informations found in the Event. If your event-type is a common event type, it will fire EACH time!. It will also register for all Descriptors individually! It will also ignore if this listener is already listening to an Event. Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        event - the Event to listen to (it will listen to all descriptors individually!)
        eventListener - the ActivatorEventListener-interface for receiving activator events
        Throws:
        IllegalIDException - not yet implemented

      • registerEventListener

        void registerEventListener(List<String> ids,
                           EventListenerModel eventListener)
        Adds an listener for events that gets called before the generation of the resources and the outputPlugins..

        It will register for all ids individually! This method will ignore if this listener is already listening to an Event. Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        ids - this can be type, or descriptors etc.
        eventListener - the ActivatorEventListener-interface for receiving activator events

      • unregisterEventListener

        void unregisterEventListener(EventModel event,
                             EventListenerModel eventListener)
        unregister an EventListener that gets called before the generation of the resources and the outputPlugins.

        It will unregister for all Descriptors individually! It will also ignore if this listener is not listening to an Event. Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        event - the Event to stop listen to
        eventListener - the ActivatorEventListener used to listen for events
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if Listener is already listening to the Event or the id is not allowed

      • unregisterEventListener

        void unregisterEventListener(EventListenerModel eventListener)
        unregister an EventListener that gets called before the generation of the resources and the outputPlugins.

        It will unregister for all Descriptors individually! It will also ignore if this listener is not listening to an Event. Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        eventListener - the ActivatorEventListener used to listen for events
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if Listener is already listening to the Event or the id is not allowed

      • registerEventFinishedListener

        void registerEventFinishedListener(EventModel event,
                                   EventListenerModel eventListener)
                            throws IllegalIDException
        Adds an listener for events that gets called when the event finished processing.

        Be careful with this method, it will register the listener for ALL the informations found in the Event. If your event-type is a common event type, it will fire EACH time!. It will also register for all Descriptors individually! It will also ignore if this listener is already listening to an Event. Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        event - the Event to listen to (it will listen to all descriptors individually!)
        eventListener - the ActivatorEventListener-interface for receiving activator events
        Throws:
        IllegalIDException - not yet implemented

      • registerEventFinishedListener

        void registerEventFinishedListener(List<String> ids,
                                   EventListenerModel eventListener)
        Adds an listener for events that gets called when the event finished processing.

        It will register for all ids individually! This method will ignore if this listener is already listening to an Event. Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        ids - this can be type, or descriptors etc.
        eventListener - the ActivatorEventListener-interface for receiving activator events

      • unregisterEventFinishedListener

        void unregisterEventFinishedListener(EventModel event,
                                     EventListenerModel eventListener)
        unregister an EventListener that got called when the event finished processing.

        It will unregister for all Descriptors individually! It will also ignore if this listener is not listening to an Event. Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        event - the Event to stop listen to
        eventListener - the ActivatorEventListener used to listen for events
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if Listener is already listening to the Event or the id is not allowed

      • unregisterEventFinishedListener

        void unregisterEventFinishedListener(EventListenerModel eventListener)
        unregister an EventListener that got called when the event finished processing.

        It will unregister for all Descriptors individually! It will also ignore if this listener is not listening to an Event. Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        eventListener - the ActivatorEventListener used to listen for events
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if Listener is already listening to the Event or the id is not allowed

      • registerEventCaller

        Optional<EventCallable> registerEventCaller(Identification identification)
                                     throws IllegalIDException
        Registers with the LocalEventManager to fire an event.

        Note: the same Event can be fired from multiple sources. Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        identification - the Identification of the the instance
        Returns:
        an Optional, empty if already registered
        Throws:
        IllegalIDException - not yet implemented

      • unregisterEventCaller

        void unregisterEventCaller(Identification identification)
        Unregister with the LocalEventManager.

        Method is thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        identification - the Identification of the the instance

      • fireEvent

        void fireEvent(EventModel event)
        throws IllegalIDException,
               MultipleEventsException
        This method fires an Event
        Parameters:
        event - the fired Event
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessError - not yet implemented
        IllegalIDException - not yet implemented
        MultipleEventsException - if there is currently another Event processing

      • distributor

        EventsDistributor distributor()
        returns the API for the EventsDistributor
        Returns:
        Distributor

      • getManagerIdentification

        Identification getManagerIdentification()
        returns the ID of the Manager (LocalEventManager)
        Returns:
        an instance of Identification
